allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add reservationTerm to scenarios and fix CSV export

- Add reservationTerm field to scenario create/update API routes
- Update database functions \(createScenario, getScenario, getAllScenarios, 
  updateScenario\) to include reservation_term column
- Fix ExportButton CSV export error by converting values to Number\(\) 
  before calling toFixed\(\) to handle string values from database

Note: Requires database migration to add reservation_term column:
ALTER TABLE scenarios ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reservation_term VARCHAR\(10\) DEFAULT ''3year'';

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
